price: Kuma idan an jũyar da gannansu wajen abõkan wuta, su ce: "Yã Ubangijinmu! Kada Ka sanyã mu tãre da mutãne Azzãlumai."
arabic: ۞ وَإِذَا صُرِفَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تِلۡقَآءَ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا مَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ṣurifat abṣāruhum til'qāa aṣḥābi al-nāri qālū rabbanā lā tajʿalnā maʿa al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
